title: MINGO: A SKETCH OF LIFE IN MIDDLE GEORGIA.

book.title: Mingo And Other Sketches in Black and White
book.description: 简介： IN 1876, circumstances, partly accidental and partly sentimental, led me to revisit Crooked Creek Church, near the little village of Rockville, in Middle Georgia. I was amazed at the changes which a few brief years had wrought. The ancient oaks range...
